description: This brand-new restaurant boasts an elegant, chic decor and a relaxed and informal ambience. The very young team here is overseen by a talented chef who prepares modern and creative dishes with a focus on fish from the local gulf, as well as elsewhere. The wine list is also particularly interesting, featuring a remarkable choice of champagnes and a special emphasis on labels from Lazio.
